long_description: Designed for stability during high-output activities, the Gregory Miwok 12 Pack is just the right size to carry your water, a shell jacket and food for mountain biking or a quick day hike. Main compartment has 2 mesh organizer pockets with a key clip. Front pocket with bungee closure. Stretch external pockets with easy-pull tab. 2 external side pockets; dual quick-access hipbelt pockets. The Gregory Miwok 12 Pack features a sunglasses stash on shoulder harness.
short_description: Designed for stability during high-output activities, the Gregory Miwok 12 Pack is just the right size to carry your water, a shell jacket and food for mountain biking or a quick day hike.
